findings.title: Vesting Wallet inability to deal with ETH could lead to locked funds
findings.description: The contract does not implement any further logic to handle ETH despite having a payable function to receive ETH, which means any ETH sent to the contract will be stuck forever.

findings.title: Dependencies with well-known security vulnerabilities in the build system
findings.description: The build and test system relies on outdated JavaScript libraries with well-known security vulnerabilities, making operational security incidents more likely.

findings.title: VestingWallet.soll: Missing parameter verification
findings.description: The `constructor` function of VestingWallet contract does not place any bounds on the `startTimestamp` and `durationSeconds` parameters, allowing vesting schedules to be created in the past.
